# Data process

## Mexico

### Wave 1 

#### Study-specific variable description

| **Name** | `c56` |
|-|-|
| **Label** | `how much smoke` |
| **Table name** | `MHAS-2001` |
| **Categories:**| `continuous` |
| **Missings:**|`88 = RF` <br/> `99 = DK` |
| **Description** |  | 


```{r assign w1, echo=F}
opal.assign.table.tibble(o, 'MHAS_w1','Mexican Health Aging Study.MHAS-2001', variables=list('c56'), missings = TRUE)
MHAS_w1 <- opal.execute(o,'MHAS_w1')
```

```{r local w1, echo=F}
vbl <- MHAS_w1$c56
kable(Continuous_summary(vbl, missing_values = c(88,99))[3], caption = "Number of cigarettes") 
pander(Continuous_summary(vbl, missing_values = c(88,99))$summary, caption = "Summary")
ggplot(MHAS_w1, aes(c56)) + geom_histogram(stat="count", fill="steelblue") + xlab("Number of cigarettes") + ylab("Frequency") + xlim(0,65)
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute `n_cigarettes` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `c56*7`
* `88 into 997`
* `99 into 998`
* `NA into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo w1}
MHAS_ds_w1 <- tibble(id=MHAS_w1$id)
MHAS_ds_w1$n_cigarettes <- car::recode(MHAS_w1$c56*7, "88*7 = 997;99*7 = 998;NA = 999 ")
```

#### Statistical description of the new harmonised variable
```{r descript w1, echo=F}
vbl <- MHAS_ds_w1$n_cigarettes
kable(Continuous_summary(var = vbl, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[3], caption = ds_label)
kable(Continuous_summary(vbl, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[2], caption = "Values")
pander(Continuous_summary(vbl, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))$summary, caption = "Summary")
ggplot(MHAS_ds_w1, aes(n_cigarettes)) + geom_histogram(stat="count", fill="steelblue") + xlab(ds_label) + ylab("Frequency") + xlim(0,450) 
```

#### Validation
```{r crosstabulation w1, echo=F}
```

<!-- # Save -->
```{r save, include=FALSE, echo=F}

l.hds <- list(w1 = MHAS_ds_w1, w2 = MHAS_ds_w2, w3 = MHAS_ds_w3)


for(index in seq_along(l.hds)){
  label(l.hds[[index]][[2]]) <- ds_label
  n_cigarettes <- l.hds[[index]]
  save(n_cigarettes, file = paste0(datafolder,names(l.hds)[index],"/n_cigarettes.RData"))
}

```
